content:
<rule xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset" id="technology-usage-web-01500">
            <when>
                <file filename="{*}.jnlp"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <technology-identified name="JNLP">
                    <tag name="View"/>
                    <tag name="Rich"/>
                    <tag name="Java EE"/>
                </technology-identified>
            </perform>
        </rule>
